name: $100 Gift Certificate for $85
description: Give the Gift of Recollect Threads!  We will email you a digital copy of your gift certificate for you to pass along to the lucky recipient.  The certificate will work on our online store with a special code that will be on the certificate or in our retail store in Jackson Hole, Wyoming.

name: the Alpine Tour tee
description:
A Backcountry Skiing Shirt:

Show your love for the mountains, outdoors and skiing. This shirt features a backcountry tour skier skinning on a mountain range. The design is an RT original and showcases our passion for getting out into the mountains and finding fresh snow with the skins on. You will not see another tee like this one!

This shirt is printed on our softest blended shirt with a standard fit. The sizes are male sizes, but the shirt fits well in smaller sizes on kids and girls.

name: the Way I See It tee
the Ski The Tetons
description:
A Jackson Hole Skiing Shirt

This is a our softest tee with an RT twist, the Tetons. We created an "Earn Your Turns" seal to represent backcountry skiing in the tetons.

name: the Earn Your Turns Peaks tee
the Backcountry Boarder tee
description: Backcountry Snowboarding Tee

name: the Teton Tram
description:
A jackson Hole Tram Shirt

This is a basic Wyoming flag shirt with our RT twist, the Tetons. This flag has a pretty unique top just like the great state of Wyoming, the Tetons top of this flag shirt. This is an extremely soft tee and fits like a standard tee.

name: the Hannes Tele Tee
description:
SHIPPING 10/25/2013

A Telemark Tee

This is our softest tee and most comfortable shirt. These tees fit very conservatively and your normal size will work. This design features a tele-skier in powder through some aspen trees with the Recollect Threads name and logo drop.

name: Handmade Infinity Scarf
description:
A Handmade Infinity Scarf

This is an incredibly soft and comfortable Infinity Scarf.  The scarf is handmade in the USA.  Stay warm on the coldest days of winter with this piece.  The scarf is made of a the finest soft blended lamb's wool and acrylic yarn.  They are easy to wash and care for.

Wrap around your neck twice or drape excess over head to create a hood.

name: the Yogi Coat
description:
A Softshell Layer 

This is a 100% Polyester, full zip layer featuring "monkey thumb" technology.  It is extremely soft as well as moisture wicking which makes it the perfect layer to add while working out in colder temperatures.  It features a slimming and athletic fit.  This item works well as a second layer when temperatures are getting a-bit chilly.  It also works to wear casually or underneath a coat.

name: the Yogi Pant
description:
A Legging For Any Female Athlete

These are a classic 3/4 length black legging.  They are extremely soft and comfortably form fitting with no clumping.  88% Nylon and 12% Spandex.

These pants make the perfect layer for working out, going to the gym, going to yoga or even to wear around town.  Represent our favorite pastime while wearing a staple to any female wardrobe.

name: the girls bootpacker sweater
description:
SKU: G060
Stitch Color: White
Front Design: Left Brest Small  Embroidered Bootpacker
Back Design: None

name: the Vendetta Vest
description: A Recollect Threads Vest

name: the Nevado Soft Shell
description:
A Skiers Soft Shell

This shell will be your best friend for every day use.  This shell is designed to wear in any situation and the fleece liner makes it super soft and comfortable.  It functions very well as a top layer to wear in chilly temperatures in any situation.  Without question, you will find a use for this shell every day in the winter.  

Features: Full front zip, two front pockets and left arm pocket, draw string waist, fleece liner.  This shell has a standard fit and is not overly shaped through the torso.

name: the bootpacker v-neck
description:
SKU: H070

Back Design: None

name: the Burnt Camo 3/4 Tee
description:
A Recollect Threads Shirt

This is an ultra soft, 3/4 sleeve jersey cut tee.  The shirt features cam sleeves, a light brown/gray body and orange neck cuff.  Our signature two tone RT logo is featured in the center in army green and black.  

This shirt will shrink slightly in the wash and fits true to size.  Arm sleeves will come a few inches below the the elbow.

name: the Way I See It hoodie
the Two-Tone Bootpacker
description:
Midweight, super soft hoodie 
Two-Tone Hoodie, Heather Gray Chest Colored sleeves
80% Cotton 20% Polyester 
Embroidered Bootpacker Front Chest

name: the bootpacker pullover
description:
A Backcountry Ski Hoodie:

This is the perfect representation of backcountry skiing.  A left chest bootpacker skier and an oversize right hip bootpacker will certainly represent your love for the backcountry and chasing powder.  This item is a thin, hooded pullover - not quite a hoodie and not quite a long sleeve tee, it makes the perfect every day shirt for any time of year. 

The shirt is designed for both guys and girls.  Guys this shirt is perfect to wear under your coat on the mountain, out in town or on a summer day with shorts. Girls, the shirt looks great to wear with black pants, to the gym or around the house; sizes are male sizes so XS - M would be the recommended  range!

Ink Color: Black / White
Front Design: Left Brest Small Bootpacker
Back Design: Under Right Arm Oversize Bootpacker
Sleeve Design: None
Fabric Color: Gray / Black
Material: 100%  Cotton

name: the louis Zippy
description:
A Skier Zip Hoodie

This is a Recollect Threads signature zip longsleeve. This hoodie is a heavyweight zip longlseeve with an embroidered signature RT logo. Two tone material mixes the color tones in this item to make a clean looking zip up that you can wear every single day.

name: the ajax zippy
description:
A Skier Zip Longlseeve

This is a Recollect Threads signature zip longsleeve.  This hoodie is a lightweight zip longlseeve with an embroidered signature RT logo.  Two tone arms and a heather gray chest make a pretty clean looking zip up that you can wear every single day.

name: the Wyoming beanie
description:
Wyoming Beanie

This is a red and white Jackson Hole beanie featuring the famous wyoming bronco. This hat has a fold up brim and is 100% acrylic. It is a universal fit and very warm. This hat works well on the mountain and off.

name: the JH Flag beanie
description:
Jackson Hole Beanie

This is a red and white Jackson Hole beanie featuring the famous wyoming bronco. This hat has a fold up brim and is 100% acrylic. It is a universal fit and very warm. This hat works well on the mountain and off.

name: the JH Bronco Beanie
description:
Jackson Hole Beanie

This is a red and white Jackson Hole beanie featuring the famous wyoming bronco.  This hat has a fold up brim and is 100% acrylic.  It is a universal fit and very warm.  This hat works well on the mountain and off.

description:
A Recollect Threads Flatbrim Camo Hat

A flatbrim hat with the new Camo RT patch.

name: the Tour Hat
description:
A Backcountry Touring Hat

This is our staple trucker hat with the Recollect Threads Tour logo on an alpine mountain range. Represent your passions with this new clean hat.

Trucker hat, colored front and mesh backing. Snap-back enclosure with curved brim.

name: the Alpine Bootpacker Hat
description:
A Backcountry Skier Hat

This is our staple trucker hat with the Recollect Threads Bootpacker logo on an alpine mountain range.  Represent your passions with this new clean hat.

Trucker hat, colored front and mesh backing.  Snap-back enclosure with curved brim.

name: the Regal Flatbrim
description:
A Recollect Threads Flatbrim Hat

A classic snap back, two tone hat with the trademark RT logo.  Represent RT and your skiing passion with this flatbrim.

name: the Buck hat
description:
A Camo Hunting Hat

This is a camo print foam hat with moss green front.  The design features the Recollect Threads signature buck print.  This is a perfect hat for the fall season as colors start to change.

100% Polyester
Snap Back Enclosure

name: the Teton Fly Hat
description:
A Teton Fly Fishing Hat:

Our signature Teton Fly Fishing hat features the silhouette of the glorious Tetons in a fly fishing line.  Simple yet representative of so many passions.  Not only do these hats fit like a dream, they are a high quality and look good on pretty much anyone.  Don't worry about a name drop or any branding on this one, just flaunt some of the greatest fishing in the world on your hat.  

The hat is a two tone trucker hat with a snap back enclosure.  This is a true one size fits all hat.  The adjustable back will work for guys, girls and kids of any size.

name: the WYO Trout hat
description:
A Wyoming Fly Fishing Hat

This is our staple trucker hat with the Recollect Threads Wyoming Trout logo.  Represent your passions with this new clean hat.

Trucker hat, colored front and mesh backing. Snap-back enclosure with curved brim.

name: the Winship Signature Hoodie
description:
A Camo Ski Hoodie

The leaves are starting to change and its time to layer up.  This hoodie features the Recollect Threads seal designed and inspired by athlete Sammy Winship.  With a die cut logo and script text these hoodies will have all your friends trying to buy it off your back.  

These fit true to size and will shrink a bit but not much.

80% cotton / 20% polyester

name: the Wyoming Flag
description:
A Wyoming Flag Shirt

This is a basic Wyoming flag shirt with our RT twist, the Tetons.  This flag has a pretty unique top just like the great state of Wyoming, the Tetons top of this flag shirt.  This is an extremely soft tee and fits like a standard tee.

name: the Wyoming Bison Shirt
description:
A Wyoming Flag Shirt

This is a Wyoming Flag Shirt that shows the Wyoming flag's classic bison with the flag inside of the bison.  This is a unique design you will not find anywhere else and shows some Wyoming love.  It also has the signature Jackson Hole Tetons on the back of the bison.  This is on our softest shirt and will fit very standard, your typical size will work with this tee.  For girls and kids the small or medium will be the best fit.

name: the Teton Biker
description:
A Jackson Hole Bike Shirt:

Show your love for the mountains, outdoors and mountain biking.  This shirt features a mountain biker scaling across the dignified Teton Range.  The design showcases one of the best summertime activities in a clean and aesthetic way.  You will not see another tee like this one!

This shirt is printed on our basic 100% cotton shirt with a very conservative fit.  The sizes are male sizes, but the shirt fits well in smaller sizes on kids and girls.

name: the Forested shirt
description:
A Mountain Bike Shirt:

Show your love for the mountains, outdoors and mountain biking.  This shirt features a mountain biker through and aspen tree grove.  The design showcases one of the best summertime activities in a clean and aesthetic way.  You will not see another tee like this one!

This shirt is printed on our softest and most comfortable shirt, a blended, heather shirt.  Without a doubt one of the most comfortable shirts you will own.  The sizes are male sizes, but the shirt fits well in smaller sizes on kids and girls. 

60% Polyester/40% Cotton

name: Optic Nerve Boreas Inversion Topaz White
description:
The Boreas Inversion skiing and snowboarding goggle has all the bells and whistles of Optic Nerve's signature Boreas, but this version sports a main lens that features a proprietary mirror coating that is sealed inside the double fog-free lens. This coating on the inside makes for pristine optics and incredible ability to resist scratches. 

Like the original Boreas, this goggle also comes with a low light lens that can be easily interchanged in seconds  even with gloves.Combined with an ultra-narrow rim that allows for unobstructed peripheral vision, the Boreas ensures you will have a complete range of vision all day, every day. The frame also features a super soft, fleece-lined foam gasket which gives you all-day comfort by creating a leak free seal on most faces. 

Frame Color: White

Lens Color: Gold with Inversion Topaz (VLT 25%)

Extra Lens: Brown with Blue Zaio Mirror (VLT 56%)

Optimum Uses: Snowsport

Optimum Face Shape: Average

name: Optic Nerve Boreas Inversion Topaz Black
description:
The Boreas Inversion skiing and snowboarding goggle has all the bells and whistles of Optic Nerve's signature Boreas, but this version sports a main lens that features a proprietary mirror coating that is sealed inside the double fog-free lens. This coating on the inside makes for pristine optics and incredible ability to resist scratches. 

Like the original Boreas, this goggle also comes with a low light lens that can be easily interchanged in seconds  even with gloves.Combined with an ultra-narrow rim that allows for unobstructed peripheral vision, the Boreas ensures you will have a complete range of vision all day, every day. The frame also features a super soft, fleece-lined foam gasket which gives you all-day comfort by creating a leak free seal on most faces. 

Frame Color: Black 

Lens Color: Gold with Inversion Topaz (VLT 25%)

Extra Lens: Brown with Blue Zaio Mirror (VLT 56%)

Optimum Uses: Snowsport

Optimum Face Shape: Average

Optimum Uses: Snowsport

Optimum Face Shape: Average

name: Optic Nerve Boreas Hatch Green
description:
Named after the purple-winged god of the north wind and the bringer of winter, the Boreas is a versatile ski and snowboard goggle with interchangeable lenses that swap out in seconds  even with gloves. Two lenses come with each style including a dark lens for blue bird days and a low light lens for less than ideal light days. 

Both sides of the 100% UV protected spherical lenses have an anti-fog, anti-scratch coating. Combined with an ultra-narrow rim that allows for unobstructed peripheral vision, the Boreas ensures you will have a complete range of vision all day, every day. The frame also features a super soft, fleece-lined foam gasket which gives you all-day comfort by creating a leak free seal on most faces. 

Frame Color: Hatch Green

Lens Color: Brown with Gold Zaio Mirror (VLT 13%)

Extra Lens: Brown with Blue Zaio Mirror (VLT 56%)

Optimum Uses: Snowsport

Optimum Face Shape: Average

name: Liberty Bamboo Poles (free shipping)
description:
Stylish and incredibly light, these poles feature a carbon fiber tube with a real bamboo wrap. Super soft leather grips and straps, with powder baskets and tungsten/carbide tips look great and move you around on snow.

Sizes:110cm, 115cm, 120cm, 125cm, 130cm, 135cm

Weight: 210grams @ 120cm
